Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FactoryIF
    Factory to create GameObjects and add them to GameStates display list
    LessonIF
    Displays instructions and checks when the instructions have been completed
    PowerConsumption
    Manipulates power supplied
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddButton
    Button to access the Factory in order to add new Components to the display list in GameState
    AddsPower  
    Bulb
    A Component mimicking a light-bulb that overlays a transparent yellow circle above its symbol dependent on its power
    Buzzer
    A Component mimicking a speaker to play a buzzing noise with audio and visual indication
    Cell
    A Component mimicking a power source which adds power to a circuit
    CircuitGame  
    Component
    Super class for all elements mimicking parts of a circuit
    ConsumesPower  
    Factory  
    GameObject  
    GameState
    Holds all global variables for the game mainly the display list and maintenance of the list
    Lesson  
    Motor
    A Component mimicking a motor that spins a different speeds according to power
    NoPower  
    NullLesson
    Lesson used in place of null so its not need to be checked and stop NullPointerExceptions
    SoundThread
    Used to play generated beeps and success sounds without crackling or replaying before whole sounds have been played
    Switch
    A Component mimicking a switch that breaks the circuit when toggled off
    Tutor
    Handles all lessons
